task.title: Editing a room
task.shortdesc: The editing a meeting room option allows users to edit all available options in the meeting room.

context.p: When the Select Room task pane is open, the user can choose to edit one of the existing rooms.
context.note: The user can edit all available options except the room name.

ol.li: Click the edit button on an existing room
Edit the fields for which you would like to make changes.
The task pane closes, and the room information updates to the Outlook meeting.
